---
title: Inferior Acromioplasty
---


Inferior acromioplasty's involve a resection of the lower half of the acromion, including a resection of the coracoacromial ligament @jonesProjectFoundations2025.
These procedures are often used for supraspinatus tendon repairs since a traditional tendon repair is made difficult due to the narrow *supraspinatus canal* @jonesProjectFoundations2025.
